newsitem.title: HUNGARY: CITIBANK HUNGARY SECURITIES ARM RAISES CAPITAL.
newsitem.headline: CITIBANK HUNGARY SECURITIES ARM RAISES CAPITAL.

text.p: Citibank transformed its Hungarian investment bank subsidiary, Citibank Investment Securities (Hungary) Ltd, to a public company and raised its capital, Citibank said in a statement on Tuesday.

"In line with its business policy and commitment to the Hungarian market, the bank transformed its Hungarian investment bank subsidiary... to a public limited company and increased its share capital to one billion forints effective April, 1, 1997," it said.
The share capital was 250 million forints previously.
By these steps it complies with the requirements of the new Securities Act and Primary Dealership System.
Citibank's brokerage has been a member of the Budapest Stock Exchange since December 1995.
